languages.text: For 1 round the Assassin becomes the lowest {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} for enemy attacks and gains the elusive effect. Elusive: -The Assassin can move through enemies. -The Assassin gains +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and +{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}. -The Assassin's attacks deal +10% additional damage. -All {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}half cover{/g} provides the Assassin 50% cover efficiency. Elusive fades when the Assassin attacks.
languages.original_text: На 1 раунд ассасин становится наименее {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}приоритетной целью{/g} для вражеских атак и получает эффект "тень". Тень: -Ассасин может проходить сквозь позиции противников. -Ассасин получает +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus}% к {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонению{/g} и +{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus}% к {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}снижению уклонения{/g}. -Атаки ассасина наносят +10% урона дополнительно. -Эффективность {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}частичных укрытий{/g} для ассасина составляет 50%. Эффект исчезает, когда ассасин атакует.

traits.locale_text: For 1 round the Assassin becomes the lowest priority target for enemy attacks and gains Elusive: -the Assassin can move through enemies -the Assassin gains +(2 × AGI bonus)% dodge and +(2 × PER bonus)% dodge penetration -the Assassin's attacks deal +20% additional damage -all half cover provides the Assassin 60% cover efficiency. Elusive fades when the Assassin attacks.

For 1 round the Assassin becomes the least priority target for enemies' attacks and gains Elusive: -the Assassin can move through enemies -the Assassin gains +2×(AGI bonus)% dodge and +2×(PER bonus)% dodge penetration -the Assassin's attacks deal +20% additional damage -all half covers provide the Assassin 60% cover efficiency. Elusive fades when the Assassin attacks.

For 1 round the Assassin becomes the lowest {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} for enemy attacks and gains the elusive effect. Elusive: -The Assassin can move through enemies. -The Assassin gains +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and +{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}. -The Assassin's attacks deal +10% additional damage. -All {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}half cover{/g} provides the Assassin 50% cover efficiency. Elusive fades when the Assassin attacks.

For 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} the Assassin becomes the lowest {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} for enemy {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} and gains Elusive: -the Assassin can move through enemies -the Assassin gains +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus}% {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}dodge{/g} and +{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus}% dodge penetration -the Assassin's attacks deal +10% additional {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} -all {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}half cover{/g} provides the Assassin 50% {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCover}cover{/g} efficiency. Elusive fades when the Assassin attacks.

For 1 round the Assassin becomes the lowest {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} for enemy attacks and gains the elusive effect. Elusive: -The Assassin can move through enemies. -The Assassin gains +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and +{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}. -The Assassin's attacks deal +10% additional damage. -All {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}half cover{/g} provides the Assassin 50% cover efficiency. Elusive fades when the Assassin attacks.

languages.text: На 1 раунд ассасин становится наименее {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}приоритетной целью{/g} для вражеских атак и получает эффект "тень". Тень: -Ассасин может проходить сквозь позиции противников. -Ассасин получает +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus}% к {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонению{/g} и +{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus}% к {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}снижению уклонения{/g}. -Атаки ассасина наносят +10% урона дополнительно. -Эффективность {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}частичных укрытий{/g} для ассасина составляет 50%. Эффект исчезает, когда ассасин атакует.
languages.original_text: For 1 round the Assassin becomes the lowest {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} for enemy attacks and gains the elusive effect. Elusive: -The Assassin can move through enemies. -The Assassin gains +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and +{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}. -The Assassin's attacks deal +10% additional damage. -All {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}half cover{/g} provides the Assassin 50% cover efficiency. Elusive fades when the Assassin attacks.

traits.locale_text: На 1 раунд ассасин становится наименее приоритетной целью для вражеских атак и получает эффект тень: -Ассасин может проходить сквозь позиции противников. -Ассасин получает +(2 × бонус ЛВК)% к уклонению и +(2 × бонус ВОС)% к снижению уклонения. -Атаки ассасина наносят на 20% больше урона. -Эффективность частичных укрытий для ассасина составляет 60%. Эффект исчезает, когда ассасин атакует.

На 1 раунд ассасин становится наименее приоритетной целью для вражеских атак и получает эффект тень: -Ассасин может проходить сквозь позиции противников. -Ассасин получает +(2 × бонус ЛВК)% к уклонению и +(2 × бонус ВОС)% к снижению уклонения. -Атаки ассасина наносят на 20% больше урона. -Эффективность частичных укрытий для ассасина составляет 60%. Эффект исчезает, когда ассасин атакует.

На 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g} ассасин становится наименее {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}приоритетной целью{/g} для вражеских атак и получает эффект тень: -Ассасин может проходить сквозь позиции противников. -Ассасин получает +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus}% к {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}уклонению{/g} и +{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus}% к снижению уклонения. -Атаки ассасина наносят на 10% больше урона. -Эффективность частичных {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCover}укрытий{/g} для ассасина составляет 50%. Эффект исчезает, когда ассасин атакует.

languages.text: 在一轮内，刺客在敌人眼中的{g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}优先度{/g}降至最低，并获得“神出鬼没”效果。 神出鬼没： - 刺客可以穿过敌人。 - 刺客的{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}提高{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus}%，{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}闪避减免{/g}提高{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus}%。 - 刺客的所有攻击造成的伤害提高10%。 - 所有{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}半身掩体{/g}会为刺客提供50%的掩体效果。 当刺客攻击时，“神出鬼没”效果消失。
languages.original_text: For 1 round the Assassin becomes the lowest {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} for enemy attacks and gains the elusive effect. Elusive: -The Assassin can move through enemies. -The Assassin gains +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and +{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}. -The Assassin's attacks deal +10% additional damage. -All {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}half cover{/g} provides the Assassin 50% cover efficiency. Elusive fades when the Assassin attacks.

traits.locale_text: 在一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}之内，刺客在敌人眼中的{g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}优先度{/g}降至最低，并获得神出鬼没效果： - 刺客可以穿过敌人。 - 刺客的{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}闪避{/g}提高（2×{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}）%，闪避穿透提高（2×{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}加值）%。 - 刺客的所有攻击造成20%额外伤害。 - 所有半身掩体会为刺客提供60%的{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCover}掩体{/g}效果。 当刺客攻击时，“神出鬼没”效果消失。

在一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}之内，刺客在敌人眼中的{g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}优先度{/g}降至最低，并获得神出鬼没效果： - 刺客可以穿过敌人。 - 刺客的{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}闪避{/g}提高{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus}%，闪避穿透提高{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus}%。 - 刺客的所有攻击造成10%额外伤害。 - 所有半身掩体会为刺客提供50%的{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCover}掩体{/g}效果。 当刺客攻击时，“神出鬼没”效果消失。

languages.text: Durante 1 asalto, el asesino se convierte en el {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}objetivo prioritario{/g} de menor importancia para los ataques enemigos y gana Evasivo. Evasivo: -El asesino puede moverse a través de los enemigos. -El asesino gana +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} % de {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} y +{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} % de {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}reducción de esquiva{/g}. -Los ataques del asesino infligen un +10 % de daño adicional. -Toda la {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cobertura parcial{/g} proporciona al asesino un 50 % de eficacia de cobertura. Los efectos de Evasivo se pierden cuando el asesino ataca.
languages.original_text: For 1 round the Assassin becomes the lowest {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} for enemy attacks and gains the elusive effect. Elusive: -The Assassin can move through enemies. -The Assassin gains +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and +{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}. -The Assassin's attacks deal +10% additional damage. -All {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}half cover{/g} provides the Assassin 50% cover efficiency. Elusive fades when the Assassin attacks.

traits.locale_text: Durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}, el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}asesino{/g} se convierte en el {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}objetivo prioritario{/g} de menor importancia para los ataques enemigos y gana Evasivo: -el asesino puede moverse a través de los enemigos -el asesino gana +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} % de {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} y +{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} % de reducción de esquiva -los ataques del asesino infligen un +10 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} adicional -toda la {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cobertura parcial{/g} proporciona al asesino un 50 % de eficacia de cobertura. Los efectos de Evasivo se pierden cuando el asesino ataca.

Durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}, el asesino se convierte en el {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}objetivo prioritario{/g} de menor importancia para los ataques enemigos y gana Evasivo: -el asesino puede moverse a través de los enemigos -el asesino gana +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus}% de {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquiva{/g} y +{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} % de penetración de esquiva -los ataques del asesino infligen un +10 % de daño adicional -toda la cobertura parcial proporciona al asesino un 50 % de eficacia de {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCover}cobertura{/g}. Los efectos de Evasivo se pierden cuando el asesino ataca.

languages.text: Für 1 Runde wird der Assassine zum Ziel mit der niedrigsten {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}Priorität{/g} für feindliche Angriffe und erhält den Effekt Flüchtig. Flüchtig: -Der Assassine kann sich durch Feinde bewegen. -der Assassine erhält +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} % {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g} und +{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} % {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}Ausweich-Reduktion{/g}. -Die Angriffe des Assassinen verursachen +10 % zusätzlichen Schaden. -Sämtliche {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}Halbdeckung{/g} gibt dem Assassinen 50 % Deckungseffizienz. Flüchtig endet, wenn der Assassine angreift.
languages.original_text: For 1 round the Assassin becomes the lowest {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} for enemy attacks and gains the elusive effect. Elusive: -The Assassin can move through enemies. -The Assassin gains +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and +{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}. -The Assassin's attacks deal +10% additional damage. -All {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}half cover{/g} provides the Assassin 50% cover efficiency. Elusive fades when the Assassin attacks.

traits.locale_text: Für 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} wird der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassine{/g} zum Ziel mit der niedrigsten {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}Priorität{/g} für feindliche Angriffe und erhält schwer fassbar: -Der Assassine kann sich durch Feinde bewegen. -Der Assassine erhält + {unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} % {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g} und +{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} % Ausweichdurchdringung. -Die Angriffe des Assassinen verursachen +10 % zusätzlichen {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}. -Sämtliche {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}Halbdeckung{/g} gibt dem Assassinen 50 % Deckung-Effizienz. Schwer fassbar endet, wenn der Assassine angreift.

Für 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} wird der Assassine zum Ziel mit der niedrigsten {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}Priorität{/g} für gegnerische Angriffe und erhält schwer fassbar: -der Assassine kann sich durch Gegner bewegen -der Assassine erhält +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus}% {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}Ausweichen{/g} und +{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus}% Ausweichdurchdringung -die Angriffe des Assassinen verursachen +10% zusätzlichen Schaden -sämtliche Halbdeckung gibt dem Assassinen 50% {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCover}Deckung{/g}-Effizienz. Schwer fassbar endet, wenn der Assassine angreift.

languages.text: Pendant 1 round, l'assassin devient la {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}cible la moins prioritaire{/g} des attaques ennemies et acquiert l'effet Insaisissable. Insaisissable : -L'assassin peut passer au travers des ennemis. -L'assassin bénéficie de +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} % d'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} et de +{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} % de {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}réduction d'esquive{/g}. -Les attaques de l'assassin infligent 10 % de dégâts supplémentaires. -Toute {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}couverture partielle{/g} confère à l'assassin une efficacité de 50 % en termes de couverture. L'effet Insaisissable se dissipe lorsque l'assassin attaque.
languages.original_text: For 1 round the Assassin becomes the lowest {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} for enemy attacks and gains the elusive effect. Elusive: -The Assassin can move through enemies. -The Assassin gains +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and +{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}. -The Assassin's attacks deal +10% additional damage. -All {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}half cover{/g} provides the Assassin 50% cover efficiency. Elusive fades when the Assassin attacks.

traits.locale_text: Pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, l'Assassin devient la {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}cible la moins prioritaire{/g} des attaques ennemies et acquiert l'effet Insaisissable : - L'Assassin peut passer au travers des ennemis. - L'Assassin bénéficie de +(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g}) % d'{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquive{/g} et de +(2 × bonus de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g}) % de pénétration d'esquive. - Les attaques de l'Assassin infligent +20 % de dégâts supplémentaires. - Toute couverture partielle confère à l'Assassin une efficacité de 60 % en termes de {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCover}couverture{/g}. L'effet Insaisissable se dissipe lorsque l'Assassin attaque.

Pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, l'Assassin devient la {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}cible la moins prioritaire{/g} des attaques ennemies et acquiert l'effet Insaisissable : - L'Assassin peut passer au travers des ennemis. - L'Assassin bénéficie de +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} % d'{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquive{/g} et de +{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} % de pénétration d'esquive. - Les attaques de l'Assassin infligent +10 % de dégâts supplémentaires. - Toute couverture partielle confère à l'Assassin une efficacité de 50 % en termes de {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCover}couverture{/g}. L'effet Insaisissable se dissipe lorsque l'Assassin attaque.

languages.text: 1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}アサシン{/g}は敵の{g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}優先ターゲット{/g}の優先度が最も低くなり潜伏を得る。 潜伏: -アサシンは敵を通り抜けられる -アサシンは{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}+{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus}%および、{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}回避貫通{/g} +{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus}%を得る -アサシンの攻撃が+10%の追加{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与える -アサシンが{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}半遮蔽{/g}から遮蔽率50%を得られるようになる。 アサシンの攻撃時に潜伏は解除される。
languages.original_text: For 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} becomes the lowest {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} for enemy attacks and gains the elusive effect. Elusive: -The Assassin can move through enemies. -The Assassin gains +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and +{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}. -The Assassin's attacks deal +10% additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. -All {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}half cover{/g} provides the Assassin 50% cover efficiency. Elusive fades when the Assassin attacks.

traits.locale_text: 1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、アサシンは敵の{g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}優先ターゲット{/g}の優先度が最も低くなり潜伏を得る。 -アサシンは敵を通り抜けられる -アサシンは{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}回避{/g}+(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g})%および、回避貫通 +(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g} ボーナス)%を得る -アサシンの攻撃が+20%の追加ダメージを与える -アサシンが半遮蔽から{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCover}遮蔽{/g}率60%を得られるようになる。 アサシンの攻撃時に潜伏は解除される。

1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、アサシンは敵の{g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}優先ターゲット{/g}の優先度が最も低くなり潜伏を得る。 -アサシンは敵を通り抜けられる -アサシンは{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}回避{/g}+{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus}%および、回避貫通 +{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus}%を得る -アサシンの攻撃が+10%の追加ダメージを与える -アサシンが半遮蔽から{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCover}遮蔽{/g}率50%を得られるようになる。 アサシンの攻撃時に潜伏は解除される。
